TopicTitle: Oh, I was supposed to say Hi. So Hello

Articles.Content: Apparently I was supposed to say Hi. Hello, I guess. Let's see, I've been playing KSP for a little under 5 months with around 200ish hours. In that time I've gone interplanetary once, landed on the moon maybe 5 times and docked twice with 2 identical craft. So yeah, I have a lot to learn and a lot to do.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And I'm supposed to say welcome. So welcome. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I went interplanetary once. With my Minmus mission ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

If you've got any questions about *anything*, you've just joined one of the best teaching and learning communities out there. Happy flying!

Hi there,

I have joined this forum late in my pre 1.0 career, and its real fun. When i need a laugh i come here and i allways find one or some more ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif).

Happy landings, greetings
